response: It comes with a charger too

context: It's this game (Japanese) playable in US Console?
response: this game can be played on US PS3 consoles.  The Playstation 3 is NOT region locked, so any and all import games should be playable on US PS3 consoles.  I hope this helps!

context: does it have english audio (i.e Character phrases)
response: No it does not.  However the menu options are in English

context: will it fit on a wired controller?
response: Yes it hug the controller just much sure you put it on tight so you don't get air bubbles.( they're super aggravating)

context: Is there any time that the 3d is absolutely neccesary, screwing over anyone using a 2ds?
response: It all depends on the user, it capitivates our 8 yr old grandson for hours. Of course he loves legos too and loves 500 + pieces finishing in one setting.

context: Do I need to download the sims 3 and this one or does sims seasons come with sims 3 too
response: You'll need to buy the original Sims 3 separately.

context: Will this work for MS Flight Sim Gold for Windows 8.1?
response: They picture describing the stand shows gear that does not come with the stand. You add your equipment to that stand.

context: Is it compatible with Xbox one?
response: using the XP400 and XB1 currently. Sound has no problems, hooks up and sounds just like on the 360, chat sucks because you have to be wired to SPEAK (not to hear) and have the adapter. Dumb, but it works.

context: Do the headphones noise cancel? The person I plan on gifting this to lives in a house with a (loud) piano player.
response: Hi Tina!  No, they'll still be able to hear the loud piano player, but not AS loud.  I find I'm still able to concentrate even with the TV blarring in the background.

context: From what I heard, is it true that this game and it's predecessor is part of the G1 canon?
response: I believe it is.They look the same as in the way the bots look and the vehicle's. Although I don't know if the plot is the same.

context: Could anyone recommend a good/great PC to play Skyrim with mods and such. Thanks!
response: I use an HP laptop i bought 3 years ago from Best Buy, it has 8gb of Ram in it and it works great.

context: Can anyone tell me where to get replacement foam covers for these earphones?
response: Probably contact B&O.; Be ready to pay a fortune though. In my opinion, you're better off getting a new make. Klipsch is a good product & affordable. All the best
Yes, I have windows 8 and works perfect.

context: Is there a list of what type of game each game is.  ie which are hidden objects, which are puzzles etc. etc.
response: The cover of the box opens and it groups the games according to what they are. It shows some of each category. It doesn't actually come with a list. There is another disc that comes with it and has building games on it. I hope this helps.

context: Noisy Typing? Keyboard looks cool, but I don't want loud clicking when I type.  Can you tell me if this is louder or quieter then your normal keyboard?  Or if it is silent like a laptop?
response: Please note that the Das Keyboard Silent uses a different type of switch (Cherry MX Brown). As such, the keys may feel different from the keys of this keyboard.
